meanings.definition: situated or occurring beneath the skin
meanings.sent1: The subcutaneously located fat provides insulation for the body.

meanings.sent4: Her thoughts ran subcutaneously, hidden from the prying eyes of others.
meanings.sent5: The subcutaneously embedded microchip ensured secure access to the building.
